title: Brian Flores Sues NFL, Teams Over the Treatment of Black Coaches
sub_head: The recently fired Dolphins coach alleges racism in the hiring and retention of Black coaches
body:
Brian Flores, the recently fired coach of the Miami Dolphins, has filed a class-action lawsuit against the National Football League and three specific teams, alleging that Black coaches such as himself are discriminated against in pursuing coaching opportunities.
Flores was dismissed by the Dolphins after three years and back-to-back winning seasons. The 40-year-old coach was hired by Miami in 2019 after more than a decade working on the staff of the New England Patriots.
